review_blob: Boot Inn beer festival. Unfortunately no samplers given, so wasted money on this pint. I hope this beer taste was due to it not travelling well, but reading some of the posts may be it tastes this bad all the time. In a group of 10 seasoned beer drinkers not one could stomach it. Mouldy in the mouth with an unpleasant after taste.
Cask, Boot beer festival Redditch. Dark, black colour, pleasant with a dark treacle coffee after taste. One to try again
